text: Burzinski's music is shaped with lush and weird sounds coming from both Moog synths and Mellotrons. Then comes the voice, deep and warm, reminding you the dreams you might have had last night. This is Cold Wave.
Inspired by Lou Reed, David Bowie, John Cale, Thom Yorke, Jim Reid, Robert Smith, Vincent Gallo, Blixa Bargeld, Morrissey, Mark Hollis, Ian Curtis, Nick Cave...
